Description:
You are walking on the wooden bridge when you hear a soft buzz. You stand on guard, waiting for enemies to appear, but instead of foes, a rift opens in the middle of the bridge.

The magic emanating from this portal feels different from what you are used to, and rather than a gate to another place, it seems like a portal to another time.

Upon closer inspection, you can see a temple on the other side of the rift in a very familiar setting.
DescriptionAction: Would you like to cross the rift?

    "SSRewardText": "As the great adventurers you are, you decide to jump into the rift in case it closes.\r\n\nBefore you realize it, you are on the other side, and although you feel a little dizzy, you recognize this place.
